jose.name: Jose Luis Hernández
jose.description: Hi, I’m Jose, a Full-Stack Developer with a passion for building dynamic, user-friendly web applications. I specialize in both front-end and back-end development. I enjoy solving complex problems and delivering clean code.

items.description: Developed and maintained web applications using JavaScript, React.js, and NestJS. Designed and implemented RESTful APIs for seamless data communication. Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality software on time.

Performed computer repairs and maintenance, provided sales advice for IT equipment, and offered remote phone support. Ensured efficient troubleshooting and resolution of technical issues, delivering high-quality customer service.

items.title: Honey Shop - E-Commerce Platform (IN PROCESS)
items.description: An e-commerce platform built for an online honey store, offering a seamless shopping experience for customers to browse and purchase premium, organic honey products. The application features a responsive design, optimized product pages, and a secure checkout process. Optimized for SEO.

items.title: Responsive Landing Page
items.description: An application for managing tasks and projects, with features such as task creation, assignment, and progress tracking.
